results.title: Home sign
results.description: This Home sign is perfect for mom. Whether added to a wreath or adding a ribbon to hang it is beautiful.  It  is sublimated and can be ordered in 3 sizes. These signs are very sturdy and on sublimated hard board or Mdf as some know it . They can be cleaned with alcohol or just a damp cloth. They are very versatile and will last for years. I recommend using glue on zip tie holders to hold them on the wreath these can be purchased at Amazon. They can be placed outside on a covered porch as long as they are not rained on.  They come in 3 popular sizes but if you have a need for a different size message me I can make them to order. All sublimation signs are made of HDF :Also referred to as hardboard, a high density fiberboard (HDF) for flooring is a type of engineered wood product. It's made from wood fiber extracted from chips and pulped wood waste. HDF for flooring is similar but much harder and denser than particle board or medium density fiberboard (MDF) for flooring

results.title: Live Simply Love Much Laugh Often Quote Print, Poster Bundle Triptych Inspirational Quote, Living Room Art, Bedroom Art, Entryway Wall Decor
results.description:
Live Simply Love Much Laugh Often Quote Print, Poster Bundle Triptych Inspirational Quote, Living Room Art, Bedroom Art, Entryway Wall Decor


THIS LISTING INCLUDES 3 IMAGES


Each image is provided in 5 high resolution (300 DPI for the best quality printing) files:


- A 4x5 ratio file for printing 4"x5", 8"x10", 16"x20", 40x50cm.

- A 3x4 ratio file for printing 6"x8", 9"x12", 12"x16", 18"x24".

- A 2x3 ratio file for printing 4"x6", 6"x9", 8"x12", 10"x15", 12"x18", 16"x24", 20"x30", 24"x36", 60x90cm.

- An international paper size file for printing 5"x7", A5, A4, A3, A2, A1, 50x70cm.

- A file for printing 11"x14".


Please contact me if you are interested in any other size, I will be happy to accommodate your needs whenever possible.


Please take note that this is a digital item and NO PHYSICAL ITEM WILL BE SHIPPED.


COLORS MAY VARY between monitors and printers.

Use high quality card stock for optimum results.


HOW THIS WORKS:


• Add this listing to your cart;
• Choose the payment method;
• After you complete the payment you will see the link for downloading the files. They will be available in your purchase area (https://www.etsy.com/your/purchases) ;
• Download the files;
• After downloading the files, you can print as many copies as you want at home or at any commercial printer of your choice.


All of the files included in this download are for your personal use only and cannot be resold neither as is nor partially modified.

results.title: Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words, Yellow Wall Art, Burlap Effect Family Quote Canvas or Prints - HOME736
results.description:
Set of 3 wall art prints with floral design, perfect match for yellow and white vintage bedroom, bathroom, kids room, family room - "Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words" quote on burlap effect background.

Sizing options are available from the drop-down menu. These high quality prints are created digitally and are beautifully printed on Photo Paper or Canvas.

NOW AVAILABLE ON PHOTO PAPER AND CANVAS!!!

***UNFRAMED PRINTS OPTION:
-Printed on Luster Photo Paper for a more professional look. The surface of luster photo paper is also less likely to show fingerprints.
-Frames are NOT included, the prints will ship in flat rigid mailers or mailing tubes depending on the sizes.

***STRETCHED CANVAS OPTION:
-Frame is 1.25" thick and is built with a solid face to prevent loosening and sagging over time.
-Canvas come with finished backing and are ready to hang.


Please note that printed colors may vary from your monitor due to screen resolution and printers.

For more Home & Bedroom Wall Art, please visit my collection at:
www.etsy.com/shop/WallArtBoutique?section_id=16145154

For more information regarding our policy, please check:
www.etsy.com/shop/WallArtBoutique/policy

Copyright © Wall Art Boutique

Thank you for visiting our shop!
www.etsy.com/shop/WallArtBoutique

results.title: Enjoy the Little Things- Vinyl Wall Decal- Living Room Vinyl Wall Decal - Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. If you don’t see the size you need, please message us to see if we can set up a custom order. 

-	Decals apply to smooth, flat surfaces
-	Decals do not have a background and are one solid color
-	Decals are not reusable
-       If you want to be sure that the vinyl will stick to the surface and want to test it before purchasing a full decal, you can order a sample for $2.00 (this includes shipping the sample).

*Please see our FAQ section below prior to purchasing! 

♥ Please review OUR Shop Policies and Procedures prior to purchasing and feel free to message me with any  questions. Thank you for visiting Riley K Designs! ♥

results.description:
A spacious and trendy tote bag to help you carry around everything that matters.

• 100% spun polyester fabric
• Bag 15" x 15" (38.1cm x 38.1cm)
• Capacity – 2.6 US gal (10l)
• Maximum weight limit – 44lbs (20kg)
• Dual handles 100% natural cotton bull denim
• Handle length 11.8" (30 cm), width 1" (2.5cm)
• The handles can slightly differ depending on the fulfillment location

results.title: Triple Mini Charm Necklace w/18" Dainty Box Link Chain. Hand Stamped round disc circle square. Customize small tags silver,copper,gold plate
results.description:
Write the News! *Flash bulbs pop!*

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

This necklace listing includes the upgraded Dainty box link chain pictured in the main listing photo. You can mix up the mini tags, just be specific during checkout notes.


• These tags are small, but not so tiny that they disappear on you. They are 1/2" in diameter.

• Dainty Box link chain: up to 18". Include your preferred length during checkout notes. Available in silver only.

• Mini tags that are available to customize: disc, square, ticket, rustic heart. These are available in silver, copper or gold plate. 


THE DAINTY BOX LINK CHAIN IS ONLY AVAILABLE IN SILVER.


CHECKOUT NOTES:
During checkout, please include these details for each charm:

1.) mini (disc, square, ticket, heart?) (color?) What to stamp? What font?
2.) mini (disc, square, ticket, heart?) (color?) What to stamp? What font?
3.) mini (disc, square, ticket, heart?) (color?) What to stamp? What font?
4.) Dainty box link chain, what length? (up to 18")


FOR A LONGER CHAIN:
If you want a longer chain, please add an additional fee. 
Add 1 unit of this additional fee per 2"; add this listing to your cart along with the necklace: https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/add-for
Select the option "2 inch chain length" and change the QTY to the correct number. Add 2" per 1 unit.
For example, if you want a 24" chain, add the fee listing to your cart with a QTY of 3 (that will add 6 inches to your necklace). You can also send me a custom listing request if you want to order this Triple Mini necklace with a different length. 


CHARACTER LIMITS on mini 1/2" charms:
1/16" fonts: 5 across
1/8" fonts: 3 across
1/4" XL fonts: 1 across
or 1 Symbol per charm



HELPFUL LINKS:

To add a pearl or crystal to your necklace:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/

To purchase the "live laugh love" style necklace with bead-ball chain:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/107261250/live-laugh-love-mini-charm-necklace-hand

To see the Mini Ticket option: https://www.etsy.com/listing/199942449/new-mini-ticket

To see the Mini Rustic Heart option: https://www.etsy.com/listing/220324998/blank-mini-rustic-heart




See available symbols (pictured and more listed in description): 
https://www.etsy.com/listing/166148061/new-all-symbol-stamps

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want to add any other items to your necklace, or to your order, click on "keep shopping" during checkout and add any items you want. Include directions during checkout so I know what you'd like. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------



To get other ideas visit the various sections here at www.tipsywhimsey.etsy.com

More quantities can be custom ordered.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ 
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water. All stamping and patinas will vary from the photos and be totally unique in character.
...............................................................................................................
materials: 1 symbol or short word per charm

results.title: You and Me Together Forever - Master Bedroom Decor -  Vinyl Wall Decal- Bedroom Vinyl Wall Decal - Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. If you don’t see the size you need, please message us to see if we can set up a custom order. 

-	Decals apply to smooth, flat surfaces
-	Decals do not have a background and are one solid color
-	Decals are not reusable
-       If you want to be sure that the vinyl will stick to the surface and want to test it before purchasing a full decal, you can order a sample for $2.00 (this includes shipping the sample).

*Please see our FAQ section below prior to purchasing!
